scripts.getschema: cp prisma/yoga-schema.prisma ../shared-db/prisma/ && cd ../shared-db && node concatenate-schemas.js && cp ./prisma/schema.prisma prisma/ && cd ../yoga-server
scripts.migrate: cd ../shared-db && node concatenate-schemas.js && npx prisma migrate dev --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && cd ../yoga-server
scripts.dockertest: docker run --rm yoga-server npm run test
scripts.dockerpush: echo do not push from your machine. image was build with your machine architecture. correct architecture is graviton
